content:
I've made a PR to separate out the rust host files from the roc platform files for basic-cli https://github.com/roc-lang/basic-cli/pull/194

I think this is a better way to structure a platform files, but I am not sure. I've ben experimenting with this structure in other repositories, but basic-cli is more complicated.

If anyone has any comments or feedback, that would be most appreciated.
